channel.title: CVE Feed for Open Dental -- Open Dental
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Open Dental -- Open Dental

item.title: CVE-2018-15717|2024-09-17T00:26:20.760Z -- open%20dental -- open%20dental
item.description: Open Dental before version 18.4 stores user passwords as base64 encoded MD5 hashes.

item.title: CVE-2018-15718|2024-09-17T04:13:56.936Z -- open%20dental -- open%20dental
item.description: Open Dental before version 18.4 transmits the entire user database over the network when a remote unauthenticated user accesses the command prompt. This allows the attacker to gain access to usernames, password hashes, privilege levels, and more.
